name: GRAPPLE-SHOOTER
description:
This is a grappling game in which your main objective is to grapple and reach the tallest building.

REMEMBER:- THE SHOOTING RANGE OF GRAPPLING GUN IS LIMITED SO YOU CAN ONLY SHOOT IN A LIMITED RANGE!!!

CONTROLS:-

W,A,S,D-MOVEMENT

LFT_CTRL OR COMMAND-CROUCH

LFT_CLICK-GRAPPLE (HOLD LMB IN ORDER TO SWING)

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:-

MINIMUM:- INTEL I3 /AMD FX 4300 OR BETTER ; 4GB RAM; INTEGRATED GRAPHICS.

RECOMMENDED:-INTEL I5/AMD FX 6300 OR BETTER ; 8GB RAM ; GT 710 GRAPHICS CARD.

TRY YOUR BEST TO REACH THE HIGHEST POINT!!!!
